name: Shoot for the Stars (MutedFox)
description:
A tiny game that lets you shoot down some space pirates in a ship of your own. Destroying enemies will recharge your missiles, and the more enemies you kill without taking a hit will increase the number of points you get. Try to aim for a high score!

CONTROLS (default):

-Move with arrow keys/WASD
-Rapid fire bullets with LMB/LCTRL
-Fire missiles with RMB/RCTRL
-Pause and unpause with Escape
